api
Class TaskImpl<T>

java.lang.Object
  api.TaskImpl<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Task<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
EuclideanTspSuccessorTask, EuclideanTspTask, FibonacciSuccessorTask, FibonacciTask, MandelbrotSetSuccessorTask, MandelbrotSetTask
public abstract class TaskImpl<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Task<T>

Represents any task which involves combinatorial optimizations that can solved using Branch and Bound Paradigm

Author:
Vijayaraghavan Subbaiah

getTaskType

public Task.TaskType getTaskType()
Gets the Two Types of tasks Space can execute. Child tasks will be the one created for dividing the problem into sub problems. Successor tasks are the ones creating for conquering the results returned and compose them into a solution for the overall problem

Specified by:
